author: tedyu
msg: HBASE-3421  Very wide rows -- 30M plus -- cause us OOME (Nate Putnam)

author: schultz
msg: Fixed bug #51687: Improve JreMemoryLeakPreventionListener against leak caused by sun.java2d.Disposer
- Added (optional) protection against sun.java2d.Disposer thread pinning a WebappClassLoader into memory in the JreMemoryLeakPreventionListener.
